Li Xuezheng, producer of "In the Name of People", reported Liu Hanjun, director of the Public Opinion Department of the Central Propaganda Department and director of the Literature and Art Bureau, under his real name, accusing him of using his power to repeatedly persecute his company and individuals.
Half an hour later, the blog post was deleted and Li Xuezheng's account was banned.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Netizen contribution
On March 23, teachers in Leping City, a subordinate city of Jingdezhen City, Jiangxi Province, spontaneously protested at the gate of Leping Middle School in Jiangxi Province because of long-term dissatisfaction with the salary of teachers, which was far behind that of Jingdezhen City and Fuliang County.
Demanding equal pay for equal work and back pay for performance-based wages

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: At noon, the police, the municipal party secretary and the municipal party propaganda department minister arrived and negotiated with the protesting teachers.

On March 23, in a course on Mao Zedong Thought at a university in Beijing, the teacher popularized to students "Why Putin is so awesome" and "Marry someone like Putin".

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Recently, many netizens have submitted articles saying that they have received notices that expressions such as "epidemic", "new crown", "new coronavirus pneumonia", "lockdown", and "anti-epidemic" should not appear in annual reports, announcements, and other reports. They can be adjusted to related statements such as economic downturn, shrinking demand, and industry cycle impacts.

The public account "Administrative Litigation Cases" announced that the number of public administrative litigation cases in China has been declining year by year, from 550,000 in 2019 to only 31 administrative litigation judgments on the entire judgment document network in 2023.
